lead_paragraph: The Indiana Pacers completed a sign-and-trade deal yesterday with Atlanta for forward Al Harrington, one of the league’s top free agents. The Pacers acquired Harrington and center John Edwards for a 2007 first-round pick.
snippet: The Indiana Pacers completed a sign-and-trade deal yesterday with Atlanta for forward Al Harrington, one of the league’s top free agents. The Pacers acquired Harrington and center John Edwards for a 2007 first-round pick.
